alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Lunenburg; Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 4:37PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Mecklenburg, southeastern Lunenburg and southwestern Brunswick Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 436 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Boydton, or 8 miles southwest of South Hill, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... South Hill, Brodnax, Brunswick, La Crosse, Boydton, Ebony, Dundas, Bacons Fork, Gills Corner, Beechwood, Bowens Corner, John H Kerr Dam, North View, White Plains, Meredithville, Forksville, Lafoon Corner, Bracey, Keats and Baskerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
